title: Bad Medicine, Part 3: Death by Diagnosis (Rebroadcast)
description: By some estimates, medical error is the third-leading cause of death in the U.S. How can that be? And what's to be done? Our third and final episode in this series offers some encouraging answers.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
